help-file.title: CLASSES
help-file.content:
Once you have selected the race of being you wish to play, you must select a class. A class is the trade or profession at which your character will excel. Not all classes are available for each race, as it would be highly unlikely that an unintelligent, clumsy troll would take up the demanding profession of assassin. There are four main "types" of classes (Fighters, Priests, Rogues and Magic-Users) available, and the available classes are listed below the headings of each one.
Fighter Priest Rogue Magic-User ======= ====== ===== ========== Warrior Cleric Thief Sorcerer Ranger Druid Assassin Necromancer Paladin Shaman Mercenary Conjurer Anti-Paladin Warlock Bard Psionicist Monk Ethermancer Unholy-Piper Illusionist Reaver Alchemist Berserker Dreadlord
NOTE: For more information on each class, type: "help <classname>" or "help skill_<classname>"
